lead_paragraph: Ricky Webster of Wilson, Pa., expressed remorse for not telling three women of his infection, but the judge who sentenced him said, “This ranks among the most cowardly of human acts.”

headline.main: Man With H.I.V. Gets Prison Time, Again, for Unprotected Sex

snippet: Ricky Webster of Wilson, Pa., expressed remorse for not telling three women of his infection, but the judge who sentenced him said, “This ranks among the most cowardly of human acts.”
